verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David; to bring to remembrance. Make haste, O <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H2363>me<s%>; Make haste to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah.

Let them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> and <S%H954>confounded<s%> That <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: Let them be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%> and brought to <S%H3637>dishonor<s%> That <S%H2655>delight<s%> in my <S%H7451>hurt<s%>.
Let them be turned <S%H7725>back<s%> by <S%H6118>reason<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> That <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H1889>Aha<s%>, <S%H1889>aha<s%>.

Let all those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H157>thee<s%>; And let such as love thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, Let <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%>.

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>; Make <S%H2363>haste<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O God: Thou art my <S%H5828>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, make no <S%H309>tarrying<s%>.
